icp.application.classification

Class ClassificationStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • icp.application.classification.ClassificationStatistics

  • public class ClassificationStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds results of classification if the target data with expected classes is provided. Can calculate accuracy.
    Author:
    Lukas Vareka
